glsa.title: Conky: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A privilege escalation vulnerability was found in Conky.

background.p: Conky is an advanced, highly configurable system monitor for X.

description.p: A privilege escalation vulnerability due to an insecure temporary file was found in Conky.

impact.p: A local attacker could possibly overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running Conky.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Conky users should upgrade to the latest version:
